name: Beer Pong Extreme
description:
Welcome to the professional sport known as Beer Pong Extreme!!

With this FULL version of Beer Pong Extreme you can have access to 5+ game modes upon release, Classic Pong and Basket Pong just like in the free version, however, Golf Pong, Rope Toss and Dwarven Ring Tossing are the modes you will unlock as well as any other future modes made!!

Please note: This game is intended to be played against friends locally, however, a single player mode may be added in the future.

Go head to head against your friends in the best mobile Beer Pong game ever made in the history of mankind! (to date)

Download it for an iOS device here!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id1141733593
